tasks.label: Git Add, Commit & Push with Files
tasks.command: if ((git status --porcelain).Length -gt 0) { git add .; $msg = 'Modified: ' + ((git diff --cached --name-only) -join ', '); git commit -m $msg; git push } else { Write-Host 'No changes to commit' }
tasks.detail: Automatically commits changed files with their names, then pushes to remote
